name: Misty Step
classes: Sorcerer, Warlock, Wizard, Druid (Land), Paladin (Ancients), Paladin (Vengeance), Druid (Land), Ranger (Horizon Walker), Ranger (Fey Wanderer), Ranger (Fey Wanderer (UA))
text:
Briefly surrounded by silvery mist, you teleport up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space that you can see.
Source: Player's Handbook p. 260
